Class FailureDAORedisImpl

java.lang.Object
net.greghaines.jesque.meta.dao.impl.FailureDAORedisImpl
All Implemented Interfaces:
FailureDAO
public class FailureDAORedisImpl extends Object implements FailureDAO
Accesses failure information about Jesque/Resque from Redis.
Author:
Greg Haines
